name: Wayfeather
description:
*NOTE: This game requires a keyboard to play.*

*DEVS SHORTCUTS: Press Escape in a level to return to Menu. Press R in a level to restart level. Press 2/3/4 in the menu to go to Level 2/3/4.*

*NOTE: This game is currently in development. Features may be incomplete.*

Wayfeather

Native bird populations dwindle in a city that's grown too advanced and antagonistic to accommodate them. But more and more birds flock to the city's highest tower in search of a haven, drawn by glowing orbs that beckon them to apparent safety. Playing as one such bird bereft of its family, can you make it to this paradise before succumbing to obstacles and weakness? Find haven in Wayfeather.

Features
  • You play as a bird, now alone and last to leave the nest!
  • Fly through an unforgiving city in this simple sidescroller platformer game.
  • Avoid obstacles such as bird spikes, drones, and flying trash that will deplete your energy.
  • Watch out! Despite your youth, you feel frail, and can't flap your wings for long. Collect mysterious glowing orbs to replenish your energy. 
  • Don't lose your energy! If your energy reaches zero, you pass out and have to start over!
  • Travel across the city to find the fabled haven the dwindling bird population seems called to find.
Development Team
  • Main Programmer, Composer, Sound Designer - Gyle
  • Main Artist/Animator, Level Designer - Dany
